data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fuente, Ricardo Pérez-De La, Perrichot, Vincent, Ortega-Blanco, Jaime, Delclòs, Xavier, Engel, Michael S. (2012): Description of the male of Megalava truncata Perrichot (Hymenoptera: Megalyridae) in Early Cretaceous amber from El Soplao (Spain). Zootaxa 3274: 29-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210266
